SELECT CASE WHEN AP.CONSUM IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE AP.CONSUM END AS consum ,CASE WHEN AP.BALANCE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE AP.BALANCE END AS balance FROM (SELECT SUM(AAPEC.BALANCE) AS BALANCE,SUM(AAPEC.CONSUM) AS CONSUM FROM ( SELECT ACC.BALANCE,SUM(APEC.CONSUM) AS CONSUM FROM account ACC LEFT JOIN (SELECT ACC.ACCOUNT_ID, IFNULL(IC.CLICK_NUM,0)*IFNULL(EG.BILL,0) AS CONSUM FROM account ACC LEFT JOIN plant P ON ACC.ACCOUNT_ID=P.ACC_ID LEFT JOIN extent_group EG ON P.PLAN_ID=EG.PLAN_ID LEFT JOIN extent_idea EI ON EI.EG_ID=EG.EG_ID LEFT JOIN ideaclick IC ON EI.IDEA_ID=IC.IDEA_ID WHERE IC.IDEA_DATE=DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL +1 DAY)) APEC ON ACC.ACCOUNT_ID=APEC.ACCOUNT_ID
GROUP BY ACC.ACCOUNT_ID) AAPEC) AP

SELECT SUM(PT.TOTLE) AS totle,SUM(THROWING) AS throwing,SUM(STOPED) AS stoped,SUM(CHECKED) AS checked,SUM(REFUSE) AS refuse FROM (SELECT COUNT(ACC.ACCOUNT_ID) AS TOTLE, CASE WHEN ACC.ACCOUNT_STATE=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS THROWING, CASE WHEN ACC.ACCOUNT_STATE=2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS STOPED, CASE WHEN ACC.ACCOUNT_STATE=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS CHECKED, CASE WHEN ACC.ACCOUNT_STATE=4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS REFUSE FROM account ACC GROUP BY ACC.ACCOUNT_ID,ACC.ACCOUNT_STATE)PT

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(IEPA.IDEA_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') AS IDEA_DATE ,AVG(IEPA.CLICK_RATE) AS CLICK_RATE ,AVG(IEPA.BILL) AS BILL ,SUM(IEPA.CLICK_NUM) AS CLICK_NUM ,FORMAT(SUM(IEPA.CLICK_NUM)/AVG(IEPA.CLICK_RATE),0) AS EXTENT_NUM ,(SUM(IEPA.CLICK_NUM)*AVG(IEPA.BILL)) AS CONSUM FROM (SELECT ACC.CLICK_RATE,EG.BILL,IC.IDEA_DATE,IC.CLICK_NUM FROM sevenmanager.ideaclick IC LEFT JOIN sevenmanager.extent_idea EI ON EI.IDEA_ID = IC.IDEA_ID LEFT JOIN sevenmanager.extent_group EG ON EG.EG_ID=EI.EG_ID LEFT JOIN sevenmanager.plant P ON EG.PLAN_ID=P.PLAN_ID LEFT JOIN sevenmanager.account ACC ON ACC.ACCOUNT_ID=P.ACC_ID) IEPA GROUP BY IEPA.IDEA_DATE ORDER BY IEPA.IDEA_DATE

SELECT ACC.ACCOUNT_ID,ACC.ACCOUNT_NAME,ACC.FIRM_NAME,ACC.CLICK_RATE,ACC.BALANCE,FA.CLICK_NUM,FA.UNIT_PRICE,ACC.ACCOUNT_STATE,ACC.DAY_PREDECT ,format(FA.CLICK_NUM*100/ACC.CLICK_RATE,0) AS EXHIBITS ,ACC.DAY_PREDECT,FORMAT(FA.CLICK_NUM*FA.UNIT_PRICE,2) AS CONSUM FROM sevenmanager.account ACC LEFT JOIN (SELECT P.ACC_ID,SUM(IC.CLICK_NUM) AS CLICK_NUM ,FORMAT(AVG(EG.BILL),1) AS UNIT_PRICE
FROM sevenmanager.plant P LEFT JOIN sevenmanager.extent_group EG ON P.PLAN_ID=EG.PLAN_ID LEFT JOIN sevenmanager.extent_idea EI ON EI.EG_ID=EG.EG_ID LEFT JOIN sevenmanager.ideaclick IC ON EI.IDEA_ID=IC.IDEA_ID
GROUP BY P.ACC_ID) FA ON ACC.ACCOUNT_ID=FA.ACC_ID
